## Voice.addEventListener() method

Registered event. Raised when the SDK is registered for incoming calls.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addEventListener(registeredEvent: Voice.Event.Registered, listener: Voice.Listener.Registered): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  registeredEvent | [Voice.Event.Registered](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.event_enum.md) | The raised event string. |
|  listener | [Voice.Listener.Registered](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.listener_namespace.registered_typealias.md) | A listener function that will be invoked when the event is raised. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this

- The call object.

## Example


```typescript
voice.addEventListener(Voice.Event.Registered, () => {
  // handle successful registration for incoming calls
});
```
